description: n divisible by at least one twin prime (A001097).
example: 36 is included because 36 is divisible by 3 and 3+2 is a prime.
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = {my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, p = f[i, 1]; if (isprime(p-2) || isprime(p+2), return (1));); return (0);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 20 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Jul 09 2001
extensions: Offset changed to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, May 20 2014
